message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the concept of information freshness and its relation to detection delay in dynamic systems. This involves aspects of information theory (measuring information freshness), network theory (Age of Information), time series analysis (detection delay), and Bayesian inference (non-stationary state evolution). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), followed by cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
